column1: Sea-Level Rise and Storm Surges: Potential Impact on Cities by 2100

Detailed results from Table 6, CGD Working Paper: "Climate Change and the Future Impacts of Storm-Surge Disasters in Developing Countries", by Susmita Dasgupta, Benoit Laplante, Siobhan Murray and David Wheeler
See p. 14 of the paper for detailed discussion of the results below.
Basic assumptions: 1 meter sea-level rise; 10% increase in the intensity of a 1-in-100-year storm; UN medium population projections
